title: Strange New Worlds
synopsis: Captain Pike and the crew of the USS Enterprise embark on a new mission to explore strange new worlds and seek out new life.

title: Children of the Comet
synopsis: The crew encounters a comet that is integral to the survival of a pre-warp civilization, leading to a moral dilemma.

title: Ghosts of Illyria
synopsis: An outbreak of a mysterious illness on the Enterprise threatens the crew’s survival as they uncover secrets about the planet Illyria.

title: Memento Mori
synopsis: The crew must deal with the aftermath of a battle with the Gorn, leading to intense personal and professional challenges.

title: Spock Amok
synopsis: Spock and T'Pring's relationship is put to the test when they are forced to participate in a cultural ritual that goes awry.

title: Lift Us Where Suffering Cannot Reach
synopsis: The Enterprise helps a society that has reached an advanced level of technological and social development but hides a dark secret.

title: The Serene Squall
synopsis: The crew encounters a notorious pirate and must navigate a high-stakes negotiation to prevent a major threat.

title: The Elysian Kingdom
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes trapped in a fantasy realm where the crew must play along with fantastical scenarios to escape.

title: All Those Who Wander
synopsis: The crew investigates a distress signal from a remote outpost, leading to a harrowing encounter with the Gorn.

title: A Quality of Mercy
synopsis: Pike faces a pivotal moment when he must confront the consequences of a potential future and make a difficult choice.

title: The Broken Circle
synopsis: The crew returns from a break to find the galaxy in turmoil, and Pike must navigate a complex situation to restore order.

title: Ad Astra per Aspera
synopsis: The Enterprise faces a legal and ethical dilemma when one of its crew members is put on trial for actions taken in the line of duty.

title: Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow
synopsis: A time-travel mission leads the crew to unexpected places, with consequences that could impact their future.

title: Among the Lotus Eaters
synopsis: The crew explores a planet where the inhabitants have developed a way to manipulate dreams, leading to unforeseen consequences.

title: Charades
synopsis: Spock and Pike deal with a personal crisis that threatens to impact their professional responsibilities and relationships.

title: The Last Generation
synopsis: The crew must face an existential threat as a new adversary emerges, leading to a climactic battle for survival.

title: The Rift
synopsis: A rift between different factions within the Federation threatens to tear apart long-standing alliances.

title: No Win Scenario
synopsis: The Enterprise faces a seemingly insurmountable challenge that puts the crew’s resourcefulness and resolve to the test.

title: The Name of the Game
synopsis: The crew deals with a series of enigmatic clues that lead them to a hidden truth about an ancient species.

title: The Story of the People
synopsis: The season finale sees the crew confront their greatest challenge yet, as they work to ensure the future of the galaxy.
